fr: What's this machine for? Is this some kind of control panel?
Think of it as your remote command center in this simulation.
These terminals allow you to [b]activate platforms, unlock doors, and manipulate the environment[/b] remotely.
Just like in real-world computing, sometimes you need a command-line interface to take control when direct interaction isn’t possible.
You’ll find these all around the map—sometimes, they’re the only way forward. Try using it!

[center][b]Controls Tutorial[/b][/center]
- Press [b]E[/b] to Interact with the terminal control.
